channel.title: Rs2pk
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://i.imgur.com/u6ZDPj4.png?1[/img]
Rs2pk is a economical server focused on realistic combat, a wide array of fun and interactive activities, and a rich and active economy.
Rs2pk will be live for alpha [COLOR=green]November 7th[/COLOR].
[SIZE=14pt][COLOR=red]Thank the thread and post to show some love![/COLOR][/SIZE]
[SIZE=14pt][I]What makes us different?[/I][/SIZE]
[B]Our commitment to excellence[/B] [SIZE=8pt]At rs2pk we are committed to providing bug free game-play run by the smooth and scalable Hyperion engine. We are also determined to maintain a friendly relationship with our players. You get a chance to vote and suggestion your ideas and we actually listen![/SIZE]
[B]Our dedication to an open-source community[/B] [SIZE=8pt]The commitment to a lively community doesn't stop at the forum. Anyone can write scripts for the game and they could be featured in the game itself. You can write scripts on your computer and you can run and test them in real time on a server dedicated to this, with other developers![/SIZE]
[B]We are simply different[/B] [SIZE=8pt]We are not like other servers. We are a group of developers and fans of the Runescape game. We enjoy writing RSPS because it is fun, not because it's a means to an end.[/SIZE]
[I]The team[/I] [SIZE=2]Mikey` Dylan Drake
[I]Current features include, but not limited to..[/I]
Full combat 18+ explorable dungeons Duel arena Multi-revision characters and items Accurate combat formulas Fight Caves Trading Full Clipping Barrows Challenging bosses Much more!
[img]http://puu.sh/cmPTv/26ff893d0a.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/cmPXu/6efc4a8d18.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/cmQLv/1c8b6ebf8c.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/cmQZG/33578260bf.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/cmQbw/075b177244.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/cmPIc/ffcd6b7af2.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/cmQyq/facbd77084.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/cmR7K/5fb8ba546d.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/cmRbt/62d822b6ef.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/cmRj1/8800c645f9.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/cmRoW/eb9402d24c.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/cmRtw/1ef04f51d6.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/cmRv8/dd05133447.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/cmRwP/5592480a27.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/cmRCC/55c79d2b32.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/cmRGo/161773f17d.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/cmRHo/3a73434b5c.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/cmRIc/43c7e6b269.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/cmS5m/e44ffd3edb.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/cmTBz/af288d4093.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/cmSaV/5569a68f5d.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/cmSmJ/9c00c3f221.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/cmSss/492b6fb8e3.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/cmSC9/a5944862b5.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/cmUrv/9db3d32b78.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/cmUv0/ea0a85c676.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/cn1A2/f46bce6408.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/cn2RW/52af2f1ce1.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/cn4rW/70831f74f8.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/cogks/66066da264.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/cohFh/9163fc6cc1.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/cokfI/c952e5b54a.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/com7F/8b2b4aeeef.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/comLB/e80c0b6610.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/comSC/f487f6b998.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/ctwgy/2b95261780.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/ctzqY/3a082d5cb6.png[/img]
To support this project, please use this in your signature: [code] [URL="http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/projects/572356-rs2pk.html"] [img]http://i.imgur.com/bOqP9r4.png[ /img][ /URL] [/code] Rs2pk is based on blank Hyperion 464 and the Paragon client.

item.title: Rs2pk
item.dc:creator: @Mikey_Sasse Mikey Sasse
item.description:
@Mikey_Sasse wrote:

Mikeyzzz:

The High detail client and the low gameframe are just contradictory and defeat the purpose of an old school feel. At least bring the gameframe up to a 474…

We will be adding more gameframes in the future. Thanks for the reply




Read full topic
